name: Niiarshare
tagline: Niiar Shareis an Open Source collaboration and sharing tool that is designed to keep things simple and to stay out of your way. It allows you to instantly sync with Git repositories and is available for Linux distributions, Mac and Windows.
body:
## Niiar Share

NIIAR Share is an Open Source collaboration and sharing tool that is designed to keep things simple and to stay out of your way. It allows you to instantly sync with [Git](http://www.git-scm.org/) repositories and is available for Linux distributions, Mac and Windows.


### Finally...

Have fun, make awesome. :)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
